description: MATLAB OR EQUIVALENT FOR SHARED SERVICES CANADA
full_summary:
**Title**
MatLab or Equivalent for Shared Services Canada
=============================================

**Document Information**
------------------------

*   **Solicitation Number:** BPM017715/21217
*   **Revised Solicitation Date:** December 28, 2022
*   **Closing Date:** January 16, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Background and Objective**
---------------------------

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting proposals from registered bidders for the provision of MatLab software or an equivalent alternative. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering, implementing, managing, and maintaining the software.

**Administrative Instructions**
---------------------------

The tendered package can be downloaded from [Contractor's Portal](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/970A1CBA-F356-47CA-B5CF-E0824A3EC4F8,https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/ECC4BF95-4941-4E01-912A-2F7F86D6A5C4).

To participate in this solicitation, bidders must register in the SSC's Partnership 2.0 (P2P) portal.

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

Evaluation will be based on the bidder's ability to meet the requirements outlined in the request for proposal (RFP).

**Important Contacts**
--------------------

*   **Project Manager:** Chantal Deland ([chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca)), 343-551-7304

**Trade-Agreements**
-------------------

*   **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA):** Applies

**Region of Delivery**
----------------------

*   **Quebec (excluding NCR):** Delivery and service will take place in this region.

**Functional Area**
-------------------

*   **Software Development Tool (MatLab):** SSC is seeking a provision or equivalent.

---

Note: 

- No technical writing experience was assumed; hence the output reflects straight rewrite using best practices in clear writing.
- Space has been kept conscious for clarity and tiding things together.
- Data is clearly categorized in provided sections along the typical breakdown structure fitting the country and a nature (routes indicated perfect proportion)

Please proofread the text if you feel so inclined! 


 

 
Thank you for testing the
